Patch Set 1: -Code-Review

Looked in bit deeper and I need to understand what's going on here before giving my green light to this.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

This looks good to me.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

So the problem here is that we have nested usage of the limiting reader we need to fix as discussed in IRC last week.

This specific case we use it here for doing quota enforcement and deeper down in the layers we check the max image size with the same limiting reader which will be raised all the way to this same point. Now which ever way we do it currently (either follow this patch and remove the quota warning or keep the quota warning) we hide the other error ever popping up and just flip the issue.

I think we need to change the limiting reader to accept exception class as parameter (together with the limit) so we can pass the StorageQuotaFull here when we set it up and get the limiting reader to raise different exceptions when it's nested with different limits.

Last thing I want to see is us proxying it as something else and putting yet another abstraction layer on top of it.
Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2:

> So the problem here is that we have nested usage of the limiting
 > reader we need to fix as discussed in IRC last week.
 > 
 > This specific case we use it here for doing quota enforcement and
 > deeper down in the layers we check the max image size with the same
 > limiting reader which will be raised all the way to this same
 > point. Now which ever way we do it currently (either follow this
 > patch and remove the quota warning or keep the quota warning) we
 > hide the other error ever popping up and just flip the issue.
 > 
 > I think we need to change the limiting reader to accept exception
 > class as parameter (together with the limit) so we can pass the
 > StorageQuotaFull here when we set it up and get the limiting reader
 > to raise different exceptions when it's nested with different
 > limits.
 > 
 > Last thing I want to see is us proxying it as something else and
 > putting yet another abstraction layer on top of it.

Hi Erno,

Hope you are looking for something like this. With this change I can get different error messages for quota and image size cap gets over the limit.

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

(3 comments)

Code looks good; I think you need to make some corrections in the commit message, though.

It would be nice to have a test for this, because we have pretty full unit test coverage on the LimitingReader and the quotas, but this problem still slipped through.  On the other hand, it's not going to be an easy test to write.  I'll settle for an update on the bug report showing that you get the correct error message using the current code.  (You have a log extract on the bug, but I think it's from a previous patch.)
Uploaded patch set 3.

Patch Set 2:

(3 comments)

Thank you Brian for review, I have added the log on the bug report.
If I am able to write a test I will propose a follow-up patch for it.
